{"id":432529102,"lang":"c","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1608446495,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/432529102/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"6.5 MB","code":"\n\nint trap(int* hArray, int size){\n int unitSum = 0;\n    int sum = 0;\n    int top = 0;\n    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)\n    {\n        //in case of re-calculating in the next section;\n        if(top < hArray[i]) //collect only the higher bar;\n        {\n            sum += unitSum;\n            unitSum = 0;\n            top = hArray[i];\n        }\n        else\n            unitSum += top - hArray[i];\n    }\n    top=0, unitSum=0; //reset;\n    for(int j = size - 1; j > -1; j--)\n    {\n        if(top <= hArray[j]) //collect both the equal and higher bar;\n        {\n            sum += unitSum;\n            unitSum = 0;\n            top = hArray[j];\n        }\n        else\n            unitSum += top - hArray[j];\n    }\n    return sum;\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
